cast.name: 布鲁诺·托德斯奇尼 Bruno Todeschini

introduction: 简　　介格蕾丝一直牵挂着五年前失踪的女儿，丈夫卢卡斯也一直处于无法自拔的悲痛中。夫妻之间已经很久没有感情交流了。格蕾丝在家里遇到一系列稀奇古怪的事，而卢卡斯则发现自己连简单家务都无法完成了。当一个家庭里发生了这种摧心裂肺的事情之后，沉默不语往往却是最有深意的反应。在这部亲切而感人的电影中，比利时导演探究了人类的微妙而原始的感情，虽然没有言谈，一个简单的动作却包含了很多耐人体会的意思。（文：life_is_good@YDY）Grace is still grappling with the disappearance of her daughter five years earlier. Her husband Lukas is trapped in his own helpless grief. He and Grace have long since stopped communicating. As Grace confronts a series of small absurdities in her apartment building, Lukas finds himself unable to complete even the simplest of daily tasks. When something truly heartbreaking happens in a family, the deepest response is often unspoken. In this intimate and moving film, the Belgian director probes those inchoate emotions, seeking a visual language for the unsaid. She creates a world in which small gestures can explode with meaning.
